shri lankawa samaga pawathi palamu test tharagayen kadulu 10ka antha parajayak labu nawasilantha kandayama kridawe hasarak nodanna ayurin itha ayahapath andamin krida kala bawata erata puwathpathwala dadi doshadarshanayata lakwi thibe.'blaks kaps' pila nawatha aathma winashayakata lakweyi yana sirasthalaya yatathe lipiyak pala karana erata 'dominiyan post' puwathpatha tharagaye jayagrahanaya labime aramunin thunwani dinaye pithi harambaaya arambau nawasilantha pithikaruwan rangana herathge pandu hamuwe lakunu 118kata dawiyamen ee aramuna bindagath bawa sandahan kaleya.jaya labime awasthawak udawi thibiyadith ese dawiyama nawasilantha krikatwala therumgatha nohaki abhirahasak bawa ee puwathpatha wadiduratath sandahan kaleya.me tharagaye parajayath samaga 1950 dashakayen pasuwa nawasilantha pila nokadawa test tharaga 5k parajaya wi athi bawath, owun dan parajaye manasikathwayata puruduwi sitina bawath erata prawina krikat lekhaka richard buk 'rediyo niwsiland' guwanwiduliya osse prakasha kaleya.epamanak nowa nawasilantha kandayamata yali jayamawathata piwisimata nam ros telar wenuwata brendan makalamta nayakathwaya labadiya yuthu yayi ohu wadiduratath prakasha kaleya..

'machan umbaa dannawada kuruminiyata rasne sithala danenne na kiyala.unta ehema awata parisaraye ushnathwa wenasak therenne nathi unata sithala wadi wenakota unge kriyakarithwaya adu wenawa.ee kiyanne unge awidima wage dewalwala wegaya adu wenawa.ithin hithapan bariwelawath un buddhimath saththu jathiyak wela api wage jiwath wenda giyanan ehema, sithala dawasakata kuruminiyek uge yaluwata kiyayi, 'eeyi machan eliyata yanawanan swetar ekak andagena palayan.mokada ada eliya hari slo....'kiyala siduwima thuna, onna api ape natyayak purudu wewi hitiya ape ninnadeta karanda.meka api karana anthima natyaya weyi kiyala hithapu hinda api hithuwa onnohe mekata dabal mining tikak dala kattiyata wenama fan ekak demu kiyala.onna ithin purudu widihata kattiya set wela eka eka adahas dada inna kota thamayi weralumal suwanda gana kathawak adila aawe.ekek yojana kale natyaye thanaka 'ammo weralu mal suwandak enawa.'
